title: What were the Rome tennis results?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Tuesday, a day that featured tantalising matches as well as an extended rain delay. Among the winners were top seed Jannik Sinner, second seed Alexander Zverev and third seed Carlos Alcaraz. View all the Rome tennis results from Tuesday below. Results - Tuesday, 13 May 2025 Men's Singles - Round of 16 ATP - [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d [23] Karen Khachanov 63 36 75 ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) d [17] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) 76(2) 63 ATP - [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [10] Daniil Medvedev 75 64 ATP - [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) d [13] Arthur Fils (FRA) 76(3) 61 ATP - [11] Tommy Paul (USA) d [7] Alex de Minaur (AUS) 75 63 ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) d Corentin Moutet (FRA) 16 64 63 ATP - [30] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) d [20] Jakub Mensik (CZE) 76(5) 46 76(5) Men's Doubles - Round of 16 ATP - [4] Marcel Granollers (ESP)/Horacio Zeballos (ARG) d [Alt] Sander Arends (NED)/Luke Johnson (GBR) 64 36 10-4 ATP - [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER)/Tim Puetz (GER) d Matthew Ebden (AUS)/John Peers (AUS) 26 76(2) 12-10 ATP - [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN)/Henry Patten (GBR) d Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)/Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) Walkover ATP - Joe Salisbury (GBR)/Neal Skupski (GBR) d Rohan Bopanna (IND)/Adam Pavlasek (CZE) 63 63 Women's Singles WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) d [13] Diana Shnaider 67(1) 64 62   Women's Doubles WTA - [6] Mirra  Andreeva/Diana Shnaider d Hao-Ching Chan (TPE)/Giuliana Olmos (MEX) 64 62 WTA - Alexandra Eala (PHI)/Coco Gauff (USA) d Tyra Caterina Grant (ITA)/Lisa Pigato (ITA) 62 63   [NEWSLETTER FORM]

Rome

Sinner, Zverev, Alcaraz advance on Tuesday

May 13, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia is the fifth ATP Masters 1000 event of the season. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia continued on Tuesday, a day that featured tantalising matches as well as an extended rain delay. Among the winners were top seed Jannik Sinner, second seed Alexander Zverev and third seed Carlos Alcaraz.

View all the Rome tennis results from Tuesday below.

Results - Tuesday, 13 May 2025
Men's Singles - Round of 16
ATP - [3] Carlos Alcaraz (ESP) d [23] Karen Khachanov 63 36 75

ATP - [1] Jannik Sinner (ITA) d [17] Francisco Cerundolo (ARG) 76(2) 63

ATP - [8] Lorenzo Musetti (ITA) d [10] Daniil Medvedev 75 64

ATP - [2] Alexander Zverev (GER) d [13] Arthur Fils (FRA) 76(3) 61

ATP - [11] Tommy Paul (USA) d [7] Alex de Minaur (AUS) 75 63

ATP - [5] Jack Draper (GBR) d Corentin Moutet (FRA) 16 64 63

ATP - [30] Hubert Hurkacz (POL) d [20] Jakub Mensik (CZE) 76(5) 46 76(5)

Men's Doubles - Round of 16
ATP - [4] Marcel Granollers (ESP)/Horacio Zeballos (ARG) d [Alt] Sander Arends (NED)/Luke Johnson (GBR) 64 36 10-4

ATP - [3] Kevin Krawietz (GER)/Tim Puetz (GER) d Matthew Ebden (AUS)/John Peers (AUS) 26 76(2) 12-10

ATP - [2] Harri Heliovaara (FIN)/Henry Patten (GBR) d Lorenzo Musetti (ITA)/Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) Walkover

ATP - Joe Salisbury (GBR)/Neal Skupski (GBR) d Rohan Bopanna (IND)/Adam Pavlasek (CZE) 63 63

Women's Singles
WTA - [6] Jasmine Paolini (ITA) d [13] Diana Shnaider 67(1) 64 62

Women's Doubles
WTA - [6] Mirra  Andreeva/Diana Shnaider d Hao-Ching Chan (TPE)/Giuliana Olmos (MEX) 64 62

WTA - Alexandra Eala (PHI)/Coco Gauff (USA) d Tyra Caterina Grant (ITA)/Lisa Pigato (ITA) 62 63
